title: MTB giveaways! Win a Santa Cruz Hightower or a custom-wrapped Revel Rascal frame!
content:
The only thing better than buying a new bike is getting one for free! Today Bikerumor brings you two chances to win either a complete custom-built Santa Cruz Hightower or a Revel Rascal frame with a custom graphic wrap. If you’re after the Hightower, it’s up for grabs through the Sierra Buttes Trail Stewardship’s ‘5 […]

The post MTB giveaways! Win a Santa Cruz Hightower or a custom-wrapped Revel Rascal frame! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
